title: Replay recorder.
body: So i updated and had lolRecorder running in the background for the past few days, and low and behold they still haven't fixed anything yet, is there any recorder that is out at the moment that actually can record and play replays?

replies.body:
Use OBS 

OBS can stream or record to system, the system stress is very minimal too.
I want to be able to see more then what i'm looking at.

Oh I get you all the data and all 

Sorry no can do then :s
LSI - LoL Summoner Info, records replays when open and does a bunch of other things. I mainly just use it for replays

You mean one of the few programs around that is quite likely to get you banned, i had a look at that one the other day, and i'm nearly certain you'd be looking at getting a ban for using that as it would be modifying in game files unless everything is overlays (and given the death recap i seriously doubt that.)

i literally turn everything off on it except the replays and the champion sorting filters

im not interested in that other crap. Also youtubers Phylol and Foxdrop promote using it so.. yeh... if it were bannable wouldnt they have been banned? with the thousands of views they get

I didn't realize it was promoted by popular youtubers (i thought Foxdrop used something other then this)

I'm giving it a run, and i'll probably only use it for replays, i hate borderless mode.
